description: Detect modification of TreatAs key to enable "rundll32.exe -sta" command
author: frack113
name: COM Hijacking via TreatAs
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*[Tt][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Aa][Ss]\\\([Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\)/ AND (NOT (((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Oo][Nn]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Ee][Dd]\\[Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee][Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\[Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt]\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Gg][Rr][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Gg][Rr][Aa][Tt][Oo][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Ww][Oo][Ww]64\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))))
